title: Toast and grind black peppercorns
definition: Toast whole black peppercorns in a pan over medium-low heat until fragrant, then grind them coarsely using a pan or grinder.
explanation: Toasted black peppercorns add a nutty and deep flavor to the dish, enhancing the overall taste of the carbonara.

title: Grate cheese
definition: Finely grate Parmesan and Pecorino cheese using a microplane to ensure a smooth and creamy sauce.
explanation: Grating cheese finely allows it to melt more easily into the sauce, creating a silky texture.

title: Prepare guanciale
definition: Cut guanciale into thick matchsticks or chunks and cook in a pan with a little olive oil until lightly golden but not crispy.
explanation: Guanciale provides the necessary fat and flavor for the carbonara, and cooking it properly ensures the right texture and taste.

title: Prepare egg and cheese mixture
definition: Mix room temperature eggs and additional yolks with the grated cheese and some of the ground black pepper to form a homogeneous mixture.
explanation: Combining eggs with grated cheese and pepper forms the base of the carbonara sauce, which should be smooth to coat the pasta evenly.

title: Boil salted water and cook pasta
definition: Bring a pot of water to a boil, add salt until the water is sea salty, and cook spaghetti until al dente.
explanation: Cooking pasta in salted water ensures it is properly seasoned and cooked to the right texture.

title: Combine pasta with guanciale
definition: Transfer cooked pasta directly from the pot to the pan with guanciale, allowing some pasta water to carry over.
dependencies: Boil salted water and cook pasta
explanation: Combining pasta with guanciale infuses it with flavor and allows the pasta to absorb some of the rendered fat.

title: Mix with egg and cheese mixture
definition: Off the heat, combine the hot pasta and guanciale with the egg and cheese mixture, stirring quickly to form a creamy sauce. Add pasta water if needed to adjust consistency.
explanation: Mixing the pasta with the egg and cheese mixture off the heat allows the residual heat to gently cook the eggs, forming a creamy sauce without scrambling.

title: Adjust seasoning and serve
definition: Taste and adjust the seasoning with additional salt and pepper if necessary. Plate the pasta, topping with more grated cheese and black pepper.
dependencies: Mix with egg and cheese mixture
explanation: Final seasoning adjustments ensure the dish is flavorful, and proper plating enhances presentation.
